name: UNNAMED (ChangeDev.)
description:
A top down shooter made using simple shapes and a bit of post processing. A submission for the Mini Jam 77  : Courage. The limitation was : Cannot take place on earth. eg. Thomas was alone. Enjoy!


P.S There are a lot of bugs. Leave a comment if you find one. I will try to fix it.

Update : BUG fix. Last level not possible to beat. Fixed.
